intro4: I build exceptional and accessible digital experiences for the web
desc1: Developed and maintained the official Joyalukkas online jewellery platform, enabling users to browse, select, and purchase jewellery products seamlessly. The web app integrates real-time inventory, secure payment options, and an interactive UI to enhance customer engagement.
desc1.2: Implemented Product Catalogue & Filtering: Dynamic display of gold, diamond, and platinum jewellery with category filters, price sorting, and search functionality.
desc1.3: Responsive UI: Fully responsive design ensuring a seamless experience across desktops, tablets, and mobile devices.
desc1.4: Shopping Cart & Checkout: Interactive cart management with quantity adjustments, pricing calculations, and integration with secure payment gateways.
desc1.5: User Account Management: Registration, login, orderhistory, and wishlist functionality for authenticated users.
desc1.6: Real-Time Notifications: Alerts for offers, stock updates, and order confirmations.
desc1.7: Performance Optimization: Lazy loading of images, code splitting, and caching to improve load times and user experience.

myDetails.myabout1: I am Deepesh Giri, a passionate software developer with 3 years of experience in building modern and scalable web applications. I specialize in React and Next.js for creating seamless user interfaces, along with Node.js and MongoDB for robust backend development. Over the years, I have worked on diverse projects that strengthened my expertise in frontend frameworks, full-stack development, and API integrations.
myDetails.myabout2: I love turning complex problems into simple, intuitive, and user-friendly solutions. My focus is on writing clean, efficient, and maintainable code while keeping performance and scalability in mind. I‚Äôm always eager to learn new technologies, explore better ways to solve problems, and contribute to impactful products.
myDetails.myabout3: When I‚Äôm not coding, I enjoy exploring tech trends, experimenting with new tools, and sharing knowledge with the developer community. My goal is to keep growing as a full-stack developer and contribute to building meaningful digital experiences.

firstCore1D: Writing clean, maintainable code that stands the test of time, ensuring scalability and efficiency while keeping readability and best practices at the forefront. Every line is crafted to support long-term growth and seamless collaboration.
firstCore2D: Embracing cutting-edge technologies to solve complex problems, staying ahead of industry trends, and continuously innovating to deliver high-impact solutions. We thrive on challenges and turn them into opportunities for excellence.
firstCore3D: Every decision is made with the end user's experience in mind, focusing on usability, accessibility, and intuitive design. Our goal is to create seamless and meaningful interactions that delight users and drive engagement.
CoreValue: Core Values I Follow During Development
disclaimer1t: This portfolio web application is a work in progress and does not represent the final version of my personal website. The current content, design, and features are provided as an initial preview and are subject to significant updates and enhancements in upcoming phases. Over time, I will be adding new functionalities, improving the overall user experience, and integrating a backend system to make the platform more dynamic and interactive.
disclaimer2t: Please note that some sections may be incomplete, placeholder content may exist, and certain features may not yet be functional. The purpose of releasing this version is to showcase the early foundation of my work and provide a glimpse into my technical skills, while I continue to refine and expand the application.
disclaimer3t: Future updates will include performance optimizations, additional project showcases, blog/article sections, interactive elements, and other advanced features to give visitors a complete overview of my skills and capabilities.
disclaimer4t: I appreciate your understanding and patience as I actively develop this platform, and I look forward to delivering a more polished, full-featured version in the near future.

projectsDone.title: Joyalukkas
projectsDone.description: Developed and maintained the official Joyalukkas online jewellery platform, enabling users to browse, select, and purchase jewellery products seamlessly. Implemented responsive UI components, interactive product catalogues, shopping cart & checkout flows, and secure payment integration to enhance user experience.

projectsDone.title: Canvas
projectsDone.description: Worked on Canvas, an interactive entertainment platform that allows users to explore multimedia content. Built frontend components, integrated dynamic content, ensured responsive layouts, and enhanced user engagement across devices.

projectsDone.title: Skynet
projectsDone.description: Contributed to the development of Skynet CRM, helping businesses manage customer data, sales pipelines, and analytics. Implemented dashboards, reporting tools, and interactive forms to improve efficiency and client interactions.

projectsDone.title: Credai
projectsDone.description: Worked on Credai, a CRM solution for real estate developers and brokers. Built lead tracking, project management dashboards, and automated notifications to streamline operations and improve client management.

projectsDone.title: Ezzup
projectsDone.description: Developed frontend components for Ezzup CRM, integrating APIs and creating responsive user interfaces to manage customer data, tasks, and analytics efficiently across different devices.

projectsDone.title: Factory Grid
projectsDone.description: Contributed to Factory Grid, a B2B platform connecting wholesalers, distributors, and retailers. Developed responsive UI components, implemented product listings, and optimized workflows for seamless business interactions.

projectsDone.title: IndusInd Bank Vehicle Loan App
projectsDone.description: Worked on the IndusInd Bank Vehicle Loan web application, enabling customers to apply, check eligibility, and track loan status online. Developed interactive forms, dashboards, and ensured secure and smooth data handling.
